actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the Association of Community Organizations for Reform Now (ACORN) should lose its exemption from taxation under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Association of Community Organizations for Reform Now (ACORN) should lose its tax-exempt status.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the Association of Community Organizations for Reform Now (ACORN) should lose its exemption from taxation under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
